name: The Separator
description: Sends all low notes through a delay so you can create rhythmic  repeating low patterns by playing low notes.  And then play over them.  The effect uses a tight low-pass filter to cut off all frequencies above 100-300Hz (controlled via left pot).  The output of this runs through a compressor to make the bass notes  solid with even volume.  And then the output of the compressor runs into the delay.
left-pot-function: The cutoff frequency of filter feeding delay
right-pot-function: Output level of repeating bass notes
right-switch-function: Tap it a few times at a set interval and the delay will lock on
creator: DreamMaker
